sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id: 1, data : '' } getData = () => { if(this.state.id == 1) { return this.state.id } else { this.setState({id: this.props.match.params.vid}) } } componentWillReceiveProps({someProp}) { console.log(someProp) // this.setState({...this.state,someProp}) // this.getData() } componentDidMount() { axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) .then((response) => { this.setState({data: response.data}) }) } render() { return (
